title: AddBACnetDateRange (Method)
text:
METHOD AddBACnetDateRange : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Adds a date range as calendar entry to the Date_List-Property of this BACnet-Calendar-Object.

rows.Name: bacStartDat
rows.Comment:
The start date of the date range to add to the Date_List-
Property.

rows:
The end date of the date range to add to the Date_List-
Property.
